title: Photography graduate Rob putting Bolton in the frame (University of Bolton)
text: ( Source : University of Bolton ) Posted on Tuesday 15th September 2015 Summer 2015 University of Bolton graduate, Rob Langley has returned to Bolton to photograph and document its townspeople. The project , for Bolton Camera Club, has focused
